title: The protocol is not compatible with tokens that don't return any values
Hardcoded gas limits may lead to failed execution when opcode costs change
Incorrect block height validation in `BlockNumber()`
fullRefundLeftoverGas is always set to false as it's not checked if the message is the inner one
wrong implement of AddPrecompiles
Coinbase fees are not transferred to the coinbase address deviating from the standard execution client spec
evmante_increment_sender_seq does not check if the operation is the contract creation
Missing chainId validation of the message
bankDenom is set to erc20 address converted to string instead of the actual denom
MaxPriorityFeePerGas and MaxFeePerGas are specified for a user which is not correct
Overflow risk due to improper block number casting in `GetTransactionCount()`
Nonce handling behavior is different from the one specified in the EVM
Premature loop termination in pending tx nonce could cause incorrect nonce values to be returned to users
Conversion of tokens will not work correctly as there is no way to ensure that the token was born on EVM
effectiveGasPriceDec does not depend on the user and uses hardcoded parameter leading to a potential tx revert
Only hardcoded base fee is deducted from the user's account which is not correct
Tokens that use bytes32 instead of string for ERC20 symbol() would not be compatible with the system
`bankBalance` precompile unintentionally skips error validation for parsed arguments
Refund logic is not correct when applying EVM message
Conversion from coin to EVM born ERC20 logic is flawed
